Sentencas: The doped ceria has drawn much attention as a prospective electrolyte material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the ceria-based electrolytes was directly influenced by the valence state and type of the doped ions.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: Gd3+- and Nd3+-co-doped ceria-based materials (Ce0.80Gd0.2-xNdxO1.90) were prepared using the Pechini method.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: Co-doped samples were sintered at 1400 degrees C for 6 h. Structures of the samples were studied utilizing X-ray diffraction (XRD) and Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: XRD patterns showed that all samples have a fluorite-type crystal structure similar to pristine ceria.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) was used to measure the total ionic conductivities of co-doped ceria electrolytes at 300-800 degrees C. EIS results demonstrated that Ce0.80Gd0.12Nd0.08O1.90 had the highest total conductivity at 800 degrees C and the lowest activation energy.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes

Sentencas: It can be deduced that co-doping with suitable rare earth elements can further enhance the electrical properties of ceria-based electrolytes.
Titulo: Conductivity properties of lanthanide-co-doped ceria-based solid oxide electrolytes
